title: ATTENDANCEEEE
content:
guysss i have 76,77,78 in all subjects except SE it is 72.6, if i attend all classes it will reach 74.3 max 

will i get backlog ?

comments.body: Get a medical certificate ready in case they summon you for explanation.
If they ask you , you just give them medical certificate, they will allow you write exam
Ask the teacher to give u some free attendance
ask teacher for free attendance, if she does not give, get medical certificate.
